title: Rengar and titanic hydra
body: Why can't I activate Titanic hydra while ulting as rengar, I don't know if this is a bug or if it's intentional. Please make it do-able though!

replies.body: Does this happen with other items with an active *on-hit* effect?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZkcKj211,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-01T06:02:37.742+0000)
>
> Does this happen with other items with an active *on-hit* effect?

It's treated like hydra/casting an ability. It breaks his ultimate immediately, unlike how we can now activate edge of night in ultimate.

Off topic, but... could you reach Reav3 for me by any chance about Rengar in champion update thread from other day? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Never could do it, you would have to activate it before ulting instead. Also, it's best if you do not activate it and only use it after landing to reset your aa.
